review: I bought this product to show youtube to my kids. I think this is better than show small smart phone screen.It came much faster than estimated.And it was easy to set up.Just plug in chromecast to tv and  download chromecast app and select wifi.That's it!My kids love to watch yoytube on big screen . And one more goodthing is you can control what to show.

review: So bummed about this. I bought it because in the advertisement I saw it showed many shows that I like but am not currently getting via cable (HGTV shows). But when I hooked it up, I discovered that the ad was a bit of a bait & switch maneuver and the shows that I wanted to watch were not, in fact available via Chromecast. Also, I expected that I would be able to 'Chromecas' my Google Chrome window directly to my TV. That also doesn't work. Overall disappointed.
